text: Factor X is the adaptation of the original English The X Factor in Portugal, broadcast by SIC. A1. The 1st edition premiered on October 6, 2013. The presentation was in charge of Bárbara Guimarães and João Manzarra. The winner was Berg, who belonged to the adult category and whose mentor was Sónia Tavares.
title: Factor X (Portugal - 1st edition)
